resources.string:
When BRB is on, it is your personal assistant who helps you to compose with a short friendly WhatsApp message of your contacts, when you are unable to answer a call.

BRB will compose message of your contacts chats window and it won’t send automatically without your consent.

These personalised messages will make your contacts realise how special they are. Also, it sends the message that you do care about responding back to them, in spite of you being busy.

string-array.name: Msg
string-array.item: I am in a movie. Will call you shortly.
Thanks for calling. I will return your call as soon as possible.
Sorry couldn\'t pick your call. I will return your call in a while.

resources.string: I am driving.I will catch you later!

BRB is simple app, which helps you to reject/decline a call with a personalized message composed on WhatsApp chat window of your dialer contact.
(E.g: If you are in a meeting, and you get a call from your friend John and you rejected the call. BRB helps to compose a personalized message like,
"John,
Sorry couldn’t pick up your call will call you at the earliest".
On your WhatsApp chat window for John and just tap to Send.)

Also please be notified that while personalizing the messages, it will get delivered to the recipient, with the same name as you have saved in your contact list. E.g., if you have saved your boss’ name as Bill (short form) instead of his first name William (full name), the personalized message will go as “Hi Bill….”.
